T11ratksanu:5: santaś cāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
T11ratksanu:10: (77.11) yasya kramākramau na vidyete na tasyārthakriyāsāmarthyam /
T11ratksanu:12: na vidyete cākṣaṇikasya kramākramāv iti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
T11ratksanu:19: abhede hi prathama eva kṣaṇe śaktatvād /
T11ratksanu:20: bhāvino 'pi kāryasya karaṇaprasaṅge kathaṃ kāryāntarakaraṇe kramāntarāvakāśaḥ /
T11ratksanu:26: (77.20) tad ayam akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramābhāvalakṣaṇo hetur nāsiddho vaktavyaḥ /
T11ratksanu:32: (78.3) yenaiva hi pratyakṣātmanā pramāṇenāparaprakārābhāvād vidhibhūtābhyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ vidhibhūtasyārthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptiḥ prasādhitā,
T11ratksanu:34: na hi dahanādinā dhūmāder vyāptisādhakapramāṇād aparaṃ dhūmādyabhāvena dahanādyabhāvasya vyāptisādhakaṃ kiñcit pramāṇaṃ śaraṇabhūtam asti /
T11ratksanu:35: tasmād vidhyor eva vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇam abhāvayor api vyāptisādhakam iti nyāyasya
T11ratksanu:36: duratikramatvāt sattvābhāvena kramākramābhāvo vyāpta eveti nānaikāntika ity anavadyo
T11ratksanu:38: tad ayam akṣaṇikād vinivartamāṇaḥ svavyāpyaṃ sattvaṃ nivartya kṣaṇike viśrāmayatīti sattvahetoḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy anavadyā. /
T11ratksanu:41: tathā hi na tāvad ayaṃ prasaṅga hetuḥ /
T11ratksanu:49: pratītir hi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
T11ratksanu:50: (79.1) prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ vyāpakānupalambhaś ca svarūpāsiddhaḥ syāt
T11ratksanu:52: (79.4) antimapakṣe tu na kaścid dhetur anāśrayaḥ syāt /
T11ratksanu:54: (79.6) api ca, tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
T11ratksanu:64: (79.11) pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvad pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
T11ratksanu:65: akṣaṇikātmanaḥ sarvadaiva tvanmate 'pratyakṣatvāt na cānumānatas tadabhāvas tatpratibaddhaliṅgān upalam bhādityāśrayāsiddhis tāvad uddhatā /
T11ratksanu:70: tathā hi kramisahakāryapekṣayā kramikāryakāritvan tāvad aviruddham /
T11ratksanu:74: na ca tayor āvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyān tadvataḥ kā cit kṣatiḥ /
T11ratksanu:80: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaram,
T11ratksanu:81: tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvopapatter aśakyaṃ bhāvānām pratikṣaṇam anyonyatvam upapādayitum iti /
T11ratksanu:84: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryād iti cet /
T11ratksanu:85: (79.26) tad idaṃ mātā me vandhyety ādivat svavacanavirodhād ayuktam /
T11ratksanu:86: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa katham ādau tat kāryaṃ kuryāt /
T11ratksanu:88: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
T11ratksanu:90: nanv ayam akṣaṇikaḥ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati /
T11ratksanu:91: tac cāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣiva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe sad iti tadāpi janayet /
T11ratksanu:92: akurvan vā tṛtīyādiṣv api na kurvīta /
T11ratksanu:95: (80.4) atrocyate / satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati na tu tenaiva /
T11ratksanu:99: tathaiva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ sampratipatter iti na kramikāryakāritvapakṣoktadoṣāvasaraḥ /
T11ratksanu:101: ye hi kāryam utpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣās teṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kārye 'nuvartamāneṣv api teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthād ūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
T11ratksanu:103: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva kartāro yenāmi niṣpatter ārabhya kāryaṃ vidadhyuḥ /
T11ratksanu:108: na ca sattvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatireko 'py ayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
T11ratksanu:109: na hi kramākramābhyām anyasya prakārasyābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ /
T11ratksanu:112: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇām iti na kramākramābhyām arthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisiddhiḥ /
T11ratksanu:114: (80.19) kiṃ ca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvam api parokṣam eveti na tāvat pratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
T11ratksanu:117: (80.22) api ca kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam ity atisubhāṣitam /
T11ratksanu:120: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptim iti tu bruvatā vyāpter evābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
T11ratksanu:121: na hi bhavaty agnir dhūmabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vyāpta iti /
T11ratksanu:123: (80.26) api ca kim idaṃ bādhakam akṣaṇikānām asattāṃ sādhayati /
T11ratksanu:130: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā taddhetuḥ syād iti sattvam anaikāntikam /
T11ratksanu:132: atha sā vikalpyate tadā pūrvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
T11ratksanu:135: (81.2) kiṃ ca na bhūtalavad atrākṣaṇiko dharmi dṛśyate /
T11ratksanu:136: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasya cit dṛśyasya pratipattim antareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
T11ratksanu:139: ubhayadharmatve cānaikāntikatvam iti na trayīṃ doṣajātim atipatati /
T11ratksanu:140: (81.6) yat punar uktam akṣaṇikatve kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāvirodhād iti /
T11ratksanu:141: tatra virodhasiddhim anusaratā virodhy api pratipattavyaḥ /
T11ratksanu:144: (81.8) pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sann eva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
T11ratksanu:146: saṃvṛtisiddham api vāstavaṃ kālpanikaṃ vā syāt /
T11ratksanu:157: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjalir iti /
T11ratksanu:159: (81.18) nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayas tenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatir ataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
T11ratksanu:160: śūnyaṃ ca dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakṣā kramāder api /
T11ratksanu:162: (81.23) atrocyate / iha vastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā gavi gotvam,
T11ratksanu:164: avastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo vandhyāputre vaktṛtvābhāvo gaganāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
T11ratksanu:165: tatrāvastuni dharmitvaṃ nāstīti kiṃ vastudharmeṇa dharmitvaṃ nāsti /
T11ratksanu:170: (81.28) dharmasya kasya cid avastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kim ihāsti no vā kvāpy asti cet katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāsty eva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
T11ratksanu:171: (82.1) avastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvasya vyāpakasyābhāvād āśrayāsiddhidūṣaṇasyānupanyāsaprasaṅga ity arthaḥ /
T11ratksanu:174: paraṃ tu pratiṣidhyata iti vyaktam idam īśvaraceṣṭitam /
T11ratksanu:175: tathā hy avastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanena dharmitvābhāvaḥ kim avastuni vidhīyata,
T11ratksanu:177: na vā kva cid apīti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
T11ratksanu:182: (82.8) tṛtīyas tu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvād iti katham avastuno dharmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
T11ratksanu:183: tasmād yathā pramāṇopanyāsaḥ prameyatvasvīkāra pūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ,
T11ratksanu:184: vācakaśabdopanyāso vā vācyasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptas tathā 'vastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ /
T11ratksanu:186: (82.11) tad yadi vacanopanyāso vyāpyadharmas tadā 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkāro 'pi vyāpakadharmo durvāraḥ /
T11ratksanu:188: tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balād āyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
T11ratksanu:190: na hy abruvan paraṃ bodhayitum īśaḥ /
T11ratksanu:191: [a]bruvan vā doṣam imaṃ parihartum iti mahati saṃkaṭe praveśaḥ /
T11ratksanu:192: (82.17) avastuprastāve sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataiva yujyate iti cet /
T11ratksanu:194: avastuprastāve svayam eva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāyayā niḥsartum icchati /
T11ratksanu:195: na cāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamardanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedhuṃ śakṣate /
T11ratksanu:196: tataś cātrāpi kramākramabhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastvātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmitvaṃ kena pratiṣidhyate
T11ratksanu:204: svavacanasyānupanyāsaprasaṅgād ity akṣaṇikasyābhāve sandehe 'pi vā 'vastudharmeṇa dharmitvam avyāhatam iti nāyam āśrayāsiddho vyāpakānupalambhaḥ
T11ratksanu:207: kevalam asau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratītir vastvavastunor ekarūpā na bhavati /
T11ratksanu:209: yathā pratyakṣam anumānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi ca vikalpaḥ /
T11ratksanu:210: avastunas tu sāmarthyābhāvād vikalpamātram eva pratītiḥ /
T11ratksanu:211: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratītir yathā sākṣāt pratyakṣam,
T11ratksanu:215: (83.4) na hy abhāvah kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkartavyo 'pi tu vyavahartavyaḥ /
T11ratksanu:216: sa ca vyavahāro vikalpād api sidhyaty eva /
T11ratksanu:217: anyathā sarvajanaprasiddho 'vastuvyavahāro na syāt / iṣyate ca /
T11ratksanu:218: (83.6) taddharmitvapratiṣedhānubandhād ity akāmenāpi vikalpamātrasiddho 'kṣaṇikaḥ svīkartavya iti nāyam apratītatvād apy āśrayāsiddho hetur vaktavyaḥ /
T11ratksanu:220: (83.9) na kaś cid dhetur anāśrayaḥ vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sulabhatvād iti /
T11ratksanu:222: vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sambhave 'pi vastudharmeṇa dharmitvāyogāt /
T11ratksanu:224: (83.11) yathā ātmano vibhutvasādhanārtham upanyastaṃ sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād iti sādhanam /
T11ratksanu:227: samarthite tu hetāv avastuka iti brūmaḥ /
T11ratksanu:234: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntasyāpi vyomotpalāder dharmitvaṃ vikalpamātreṇa pratītiś cāvagantavyā /
T11ratksanu:235: tad evam avastudharmāpekṣayā 'vastunodharmitvasya vikalpamātreṇa pratīteś cāpahnotum aśakyatvān nāyam āśrayāsiddho hetuḥ /
T11ratksanu:239: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇasāmarthyam asti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyam api (?)
T11ratksanu:244: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
T11ratksanu:245: sahakārisahitād eva tataḥ kāryotpattidarsanāt iti cet /
T11ratksanu:246: (83.24) yadā tāvad amī militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvam eṣām astu ko niṣeddhā /
T11ratksanu:247: militair eva tu tatkāryaṃ karttavyam iti kuto labhyate /
T11ratksanu:250: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā naikaṃ janakam iti sthiravādināṃ manorājyasyāpy aviṣayaḥ /
T11ratksanu:251: (83.29) kiṃ kurmo dṛśyate tāvad evam iti cet /
T11ratksanu:252: dṛśyatāṃ kiṃ tu pūrvasthitād eva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattir anyasmād eva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇād iti vivādapadam etat /
T11ratksanu:253: tatra prāg api sambhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattir na vā kadā cid apīti virodham asamādhāya tad eva kāryotpattir iti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpām arhati /
T11ratksanu:256: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñādūṣaṇam asmābhiḥ sthirasiddhidūṣaṇe pratipāditam iti tad evāvadhāryam /
T11ratksanu:259: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaraṃ,
T11ratksanu:260: tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvam iti cet /
T11ratksanu:262: tathāpi tat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
T11ratksanu:267: (84.11) na ca kāryaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktam,
T11ratksanu:269: hetuś ca sann api yadi svakāryaṃ na karoti,
T11ratksanu:270: tadā tatkāryam eva tan na syāt /
T11ratksanu:275: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
T11ratksanu:277: sthirasvabhāvatve bhāvasyottarakālam evedaṃ na pūrvakālam iti kuta etat /
T11ratksanu:278: tadabhāvāc ca kāraṇam apy uttarakāryasvabhāvam ity api kutaḥ /
T11ratksanu:279: (84.17) kiṃ kurmaḥ / uttarakālam eva tasya janmeti cet /
T11ratksanu:281: sthiratve 'py eṣa eva svabhāvas tasya yad uttarakṣaṇa eva kāryaṃ karotīti cet /
T11ratksanu:282: na, pramāṇabādhite svabhāvābhyupagamāyogād iti na tāvad akṣaṇikasya kramikāryakāritvam asti /
T11ratksanu:284: dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe kārakasvarūpasadbhāve punar api kāryakaraṇaprasaṅgāt /
T11ratksanu:285: (84.21) kārye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvād ūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayed iti cet /
T11ratksanu:286: na, sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayor api sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvam avadhāryam iti prāg eva pratipādanāt /
T11ratksanu:287: kāryasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ kartum aśakyatvam eva kāraṇam asamartham āvedayati /
T11ratksanu:288: (84.23) tad ayam akṣaṇike kramākramikāryakāritvābhāvo na siddhaḥ /
T11ratksanu:289: na ca kramākramābhyām aparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyām avyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
T11ratksanu:294: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatve 'pyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣād eva sidhyati
T11ratksanu:295: evaṃ kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam iti kramākramayor anyo 'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvād etat prakāradvayaparihāreṇārthākriyakāritvam anyatra na gatam ity arthaḥ /
T11ratksanu:300: na hy abhāvaḥ kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣatkartavyaḥ,
T11ratksanu:302: na hy abhāvasya vikalpād anyāpratipattir apratipattir vā sarvathā /
T11ratksanu:304: evaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpād eva pratipattiḥ.4 /
T11ratksanu:306: vyāpakānupalambhena nirdoṣeṇa sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāpter avyāhatatvāt /
T11ratksanu:308: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ ca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvād iti sthitam /
T11ratksanu:309: (85.13) nanu vyāpakānupalabdhir iti yady anupalabdhimātraṃ tadā na tasya sādhyabuddhijanakatvam avastutvāt /
T11ratksanu:310: na cānyopalabdhir vyāpakānupalabdhir abhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivad anyasya kasya cid anupalabdher iti cet /
T11ratksanu:313: yathā hi neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvād ity atra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir vṛkṣānupalabdhiḥ /
T11ratksanu:314: śiṃśapāpeksayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir eva śiṃśapāyā abhāvopalabdhir iti svabhāvahetuparyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
T11ratksanu:315: tathā nityasya dharmiṇo vikalpabuddhyavasitasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇād eva kramikāritvākramikāritvānupalambhaḥ /
T11ratksanu:316: arthakriyāpekṣayā ca kevalapratītir evārthakriyāyoga pratītir iti vyāpakānupalambhāntarād asya na kaś cid viśeṣaḥ /
T11ratksanu:317: (85.22) adhyavasāyāpekṣayā ca bāhye 'kṣaṇike vastuni vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddhivyavahāraḥ /
T11ratksanu:318: adhyavasāyaś ca samanantarapratyayabalād āyātākāraviśeṣayogād agṛhīte 'pi pravartanaśaktir bodhavyaḥ /
T11ratksanu:323: ayaṃ ca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmiṇi tathā 'vastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
T11ratksanu:324: (85.27) tathā hy ekajñānasaṃsargy atra vikalpya eva /
T11ratksanu:326: śaśaśirasy api tena sahaikajñānasaṃsargitvasambhāvanayaiva śṛṅgaṃ niṣidhyate,
T11ratksanu:327: tathā nīlādāv apariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmiṇā sārdham ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau,
T11ratksanu:328: yadi nitye bhavataḥ nityagrāhijñāne svadharmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātām iti sambhāvanaya ekājñānasaṃsargadvārakam eva pratiṣidhyate /
T11ratksanu:329: kathaṃ punar etasmin nityajñāne kramākramayor asphuraṇam iti yāvatā kramākramakroḍikṛtam
T11ratksanu:330: eva nityaṃ vikalpayām iti cet. ata eva bādhakāvatāro viparītāropam antareṇa tasya vaiyarthyāt.
T11ratksanu:331: (86.6) kālāntare 'py ekarūpatayā nityatvam. kramākramau ca kṣaṇadvaye bhinnarūpatayā.
T11ratksanu:332: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryaśakteś ca parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā durvāro
T11ratksanu:333: virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayor antarbhāvaḥ. anantarbhāvāc ca suddhanityavikalpena
T11ratksanu:334: dūrīkṛtakramākramasamāropeṇa katham ullekhaḥ. tataś ca pratiyogini nitye 'pi vikalpyamāne
T11ratksanu:336: kramākramasyānupalabdhiḥ. tata eva cārthakriyāśakter anupalabdhiḥ. tasmād vyāpakavivekidharmyupalabdhitayā
T11ratksanu:338: (86.13) nanv etad avastudharmikopayogi vastv adhiṣṭhānatvāt pramāṇavyavasthāyā iti cet. kim idaṃ vastvadhiṣṭhānatvam nāma. kiṃ paramparayāpi vastunaḥ sakāśād āgatatvam,
T11ratksanu:339: atha vastuni kena cid ākāreṇa vyavahārakāraṇatvam,
T11ratksanu:341: (86.16) yady ādyaḥ pakṣas tadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāś ca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastupratibaddhatvam asyāpi. na kṣīṇam.
T11ratksanu:342: (86.18) na dvitīye 'pi pakṣe dosah sambhavati. kṣaṇabhaṅgivastu sādhanopāyatvād asya.
T11ratksanu:343: (86.19) na cāntimo 'pi vikalpaḥ kalpyate. tasyaiva nityavikalpasya vastuno dharmibhūtasya
T11ratksanu:346: (86.23) ayam eva nyāyo na vaktā vandhyāsutaś caitanyābhāvād ityādau yojyaḥ. etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādir antarbhāvayituṃ śakyate na tathāyam iti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ.
T11ratksanu:347: (86.25) na ca kramādyabhāvas trayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātikrāmati,
T11ratksanu:349: (86.26) yat tvanena pramāṇāntarān nityānām asattvasiddhau kramādivirahasyābhāvadharmatā sidhyatīty uktam,
T11ratksanu:350: tadvālasyāpi durabhidhānam. nityo hi dharmi. asattvaṃ sādhyam. kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvaviraho
T11ratksanu:351: hetuḥ. asya cābhāvadharmatvaṃ nāma asattvalakṣaṇasvasādhyāvinābhāvitvam ucyate. tac
T11ratksanu:352: ca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisiddhau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya
T11ratksanu:353: vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatīty abhāvadharmatvaṃ prāg eva vidhyor vyāptisādhanāt
T11ratksanu:354: pratyakṣād anumānād ekasmād vā pramāṇāntarāt siddham iti netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ.
T11ratksanu:355: (87.7) na ca sattāyām ivāsattāyām api tulyaḥ prasaṅgo bhinnanyāyatvāt. vastubhūtaṃ hi tatra sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca. tayor dharmy api vastv eva
T11ratksanu:356: (87.9) vastunas tu pratyakṣānumānābhyām eva siddhiḥ. tayor abhāve niyamenāśrayāsiddhir
T11ratksanu:357: iti yuktam. asattāsādhane tv avastudharmo hetur avastu vikalpamātrasiddhe dharmiṇi
T11ratksanu:358: nāśrayāsiddhidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ. tathā 'kṣaṇikasya kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhaḥ sidhyaty eva.
T11ratksanu:359: (87.13) tathā vikalpādevākṣaṇiko virodhī siddhaḥ. vikalpollikhitaś cāsya svabhāvo
T11ratksanu:360: nāpara ity api vyavahartavyam. anyathā tadanuvādena kramākramādirahitatvādiniṣedhādikam
T11ratksanu:362: asti ca. ato yathā pramāṇābhāve 'pi vikalpasiddhasya vandhyāsutādeḥ saundaryādiniṣedho
T11ratksanu:363: 'nurūpas tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇikarūpasya tad eva pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ
T11ratksanu:364: kīdṛso doṣaḥ syāt. yadi cākṣaṇikānubhavābhāvāt virodhapratiṣedhas tarhi vandhyāputrādyanubhavād
T11ratksanu:366: (87.20) nanv evaṃ virodhasyāpāramārthikatvam. taddvāreṇa kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy apāramārthikī syād iti cet.
T11ratksanu:367: (87.21) na hi virodho nāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādasambandhābhidhānam iṣyate,
T11ratksanu:368: 'smābhir upapadyate vā. yenaikasambandhino vastutvābhāve 'pāramārthikaṃ syāt. yathā tv iṣyate tathā pāramārthika eva /
T11ratksanu:372: nāpy abhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yam anayor asaṃkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /
T11ratksanu:376: (88.1) nanu nityatvaṃ kramayaugapadyavattvaṃ ca viruddhau dharmau vidhūya nāparo virodho nāma,
T11ratksanu:378: (88.2) na, na hi dharmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
T11ratksanu:380: anyathā virodhanāmadharmāntarasambhave 'pi yadi na viruddhau dharmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasambhavaḥ /
T11ratksanu:381: viruddhau ced dharmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ /
T11ratksanu:384: nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayas tenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatir ataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
T11ratksanu:385: śūnyaś ca dvitayena sidhyati na vā 'sattā 'pi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakyā kramāder api / iti /
T11ratksanu:387: dharmasya kasya cid avastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kim ihāsti no vā /
T11ratksanu:388: kvāpy asti cet katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāsty eva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
T11ratksanu:389: (88.17) tad vam nityaṃ na kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvayogīti paramārthaḥ /
T11ratksanu:390: tataś ca sattāyuktam api naiveti paramārthaḥ /
T11ratksanu:391: tataś ca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvād akṣaṇikān nivartamānam idaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika eva viśrāmyatvena vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhir avirodhini /
T11ratksanu:392: (88.21) prakṛtiḥ sarvadharmāṇaṃ yad bodhān muktir iṣyate /
